content.detailedDescription:
i was walking dogs in a secluded river wash,and for no apparent reason one dog(pointer) was looking above my head at clearing in tree canopy.I looked up really fast cause i got chills.I saw a large passenger jet on flight path to los angeles int.Airport at about 65 degrees above horizon.
  above the jet were three lights in a triangular shape,which covered a huge area.I tried to call home and call dropped 3 times.Finally got hold of spouse and told her to grab camera and go out to our street and look in north direction.She couldnt find camera or lights.Cell phone photo was blank.
  the jet was flying under the large triangle shape (formed by 3 lights) and appeared ok.The three lights which formed a triangle all moved in unison as if they were one transparent object, it was going from north to south,after jet passed they all changed direction as if they were one,but transparent,and moved going east.
 the speed was consistent and the lights kept same illumination the whole time. i was trying hard to quit looking at it and drive home asap to film it but it traveled t0o fast.It took about 10 minutes to travel across half of the sky.Now i am constantly looking skyward.
 see my drawing.The plane i drew was going south easterly ,maybe i should reverse plane in drawing to way i saw it.
content.summary: Transparent triangular light formation going east above santa clarita ca.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Me and myf famialy were standing on our back porch when we saw multiole lights appear over th palo verde nuclear genarating station on multiple nights the would appear then fade out then reapear in a diffrent area
content.summary: Multiple ufos over palo verde nuclear genarating station

content.detailedDescription: I was at the a drive-in watching a movie but after it was over(at about 11:30) i started to pack up and as i was doing that i looked over and saw something that baffled me ever since i saw it, a green orb with a rim of red around it was falling and behind it a trail of green fire followed and after watching it for about 10 seconds it just disappeared and a very short static came on the radio. i remember freaking out and panicking until i got home, l went home to check if any planes or asteroids or anything that was international he sky had crossed but after 7 days of watching the news and read on the internet i heard nothing
content.summary: Green and red orb like ufo that seemed to be crashing but suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was listening  to radio when i saw the ufo.It's  yellow light made the first attraction. i though that it is a new type of aeroplane. it was like a large saucer with yellow light and black in colour and it was dancing in the sky . i filled scared of it. it suddenly disappeared and i could not see it again.
content.summary: it was like a flying saucer.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 27, 2014, at approximately 8:19 pm, i was sitting on my back deck 
taking a movie of the lightning contained in a cloud.  i noticed numerous lights moving around me.  they are definitely not any part of the lightning as i have taken pictures and movies with these lights for years, inside and out, day and night, i recognized these lights as more of them, only in more detail and shapes. notice the  light rods with a light spiral around it in length.  also the swooshes of light.  please pause the movie to see the lights in detail.
i always feel elated and a sense of peace when i capture the unknown in my pictures and videos.
i wonder, could these be supreme beings from other planets, traveling by light to view and study our planet and people?  just wondering.
content.summary: Rods of lights and other lights swirling around me in video

content.detailedDescription: I went to crowne plaza hotel symposium 2014 mufon conference. i've been telling linda moulton howe of how really incredible i am for years of having a fleet of ufos following me around the world. i ask her at this mufon conference if she would like to go outside and witness this fleet of ufos. she said that she was busy with other people. so i ask others at that mufon conference if they wanted to see a ufo. i have three guests contact info that confirm of seeing ufos hovering all around that crowne plaza hotel friday night july 18 around nine p.M. the three were so enthusiast that they all said that they never ever saw a ufo before until that night there at the crowne plaza hotel within the surrounding perimeter that we walked outside of that hotel. when we first sighted these alien star ships it was partial clearing at first and then it became mostly cloudy skies and i couldn't grab more witnesses to introduce them to my star ships. the very next saturday night july 19th it call for mostly cloudy skies and i could not be able to show anyone my star ships. the three witnesses from friday night cherry hill, new jersey conference went around that crowne plaza ballroom where the mufon conference took place were non stop telling everyone of my disclosure of seeing these star ships constantly moving around the sky hovering around this crowne plaza hotel that friday night july 18th, 2014 around nine p.M. i will be leaving next month for the contact on the desert to see if i can have linda moultan howe tell the world that i'm her most incredible guy in the world if i ask her again to witness these star ships of august 8-11, 2014 in joshua tree. i met john ventre pennsylvania mufon director for years and he told me to put it on the mufon blog this past weekend of my permanent sightings of having this fleet of ufos following me around the world. i have the contact information of these three people. i also have witnesses in the nyc area of where i come from with the contact information of these other witnesses of seeing ufos here in  the new york city area. these crafts of ufos can be seen on any clear night skies any where in the world wherever i'm present with the naked eye. i want to introduce our world to their world and not have these ufos groups not show any mundane about not stopping our world from really knowing the truth from too many pages hidden in our past history books of mankind and women kind history and her story of what really took place beyond the bible and many other books from ancient times throughout barriers of time, space and beyond. julio mariano barriere
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering all around crowne plaza hotel. penn. dir. john ventre told me to put it on mufon blog. i have three witnesses this past friday, july 18 with their contact info of sighting a ufo fleet that follows me around the world. i live in nyc and have witne

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at home (an appartment in a 4 story building, top floor). i was just surfing the internet in my phone and then, i looked outside the window (from my right) and saw a really strong glowing ball, blue-white just going down fast (from west to south-east). i saw it only for a couple of seconds, but i know i saw this.
2. it was around 01:15 am so it was very dark. i noticed it beacause it was glowing really strong
3. being a fan of all related to the universe, extraterrestrial life, etc. made me immediatley think 'aliens'. however, it could have been a ball lightning. i strongly doubt it has been a man-made object like a flare, for example.
4. it was only for about a second. a ball like object glowing purely in light blue going down pretty fast from west to south-east, leaving no trail behind.
5. i was, at first 'what is this thing?'. i got up of bed, approached the window and scanned any spot, looking for more. i wasn't scared, but rather 'thrilled', thinking myself, wow, my first ufo. i told a couple or 3 friends of mine about it. i was really thinking about it for a few days.
6. my window just blocked the view, and that is why i got to witness it for a mere moment.

i honestly don't know what i saw, but i did see something. filling this report right now, a few months after the incident, mystery and a bit of anxiety are coming up. if i will witness anything else, i will report the following day.
content.summary: I was lying in bed, looking out of the window and suddenly, i witnessed some sort of a glowing blue-white ball just going down (it went down like an arrow)

content.detailedDescription: I left my dog on the deck while i was inside cooking, as i normally do on beautiful clear sunny days. we are in the flight path of many planes and my dog usually barks at them flying overhead because they get relatively close. all the sudden i hear him barking unusually aggressively. i walked outside and heard no plane sounds, but looked in the direction of my dogs vision and there it was. it was hovering in the se sky at around 6pm cst and it seemed like the busy sunday plane traffic had halted. it hovered for about 5 mins then gained altitude to above a planes normal cruising altitude. me and the neighbors saw 3 "propellant glows" behind it in pyramid form that looked somewhat similar to the space ship endeavors. it left towards the eastern sky only to get smaller and smaller and ultimately looked like a nighttime star (at 6pm), then completely disappeared.  i have 5 pictures, but will submit only one. the rest will be submitted upon request.
content.summary: My dog barked at it, i thought it was a plane as we are in a flight path. i looked up, and that was no plane!!

content.detailedDescription: Hello firstly its not hoax though its years back incident and why i am reportin now ? as in india where i belong so i learnd about this organisation through history channel today braoscasted here today- anyways  its been few years so i'm nt abl to recollect exact time nd year but it was winters here and after ending up a night party me and my cousin as we both were running a party club we with are friends went to near by hilly area to have get together let me make it clear that i'm a teetotaler and we had parked our cars in an open area and all started with their drinks and time passed and as i don't consume alchohal was doin star gazzin and then what i saw was unbelievabl in sky full of stars i saw 2star lik objects traveled towards each other and stopd for few seconds nd reverse back the way we revers our cars which shoked me as i was wondering how can it be possible its possible that two flying objects reverse without changin their track ,so i called upon my cousin and other friends nd as he was in his sencz he to noticed it we all were in shocked this was repeated by those onjects 5 to 6 tymz and den the objects disappeard without track this incident left me clueless and with a belief that their are things beyound our imaginations and iam sure it was no aircraft'or any other defence experiment and that incident is so fresh in my mind till thate that i still look out for anythin as such in sky, and we guyz use to visit that spot for mre outings but nevr again thing lik this evr occurd in my life -so that's my as their we had no high resolution camera with us so no recording possible but my words are my true statement so kindly do revert if you explain this occurance or anythin i can revert back to u for do get bak fr the same ..Regrds
content.summary: Exactly starlike 2of them moving towrds echodr stopin nd reversin did 5 to 6 timz nd vanishd

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting outside around 1am and i first noticed a bright orange orb-shaped object fairly low in the sky. it either hovered stationary or was possibly coming forward, but never seemed to move from side to side. we witnessed it change in size and light intensity. it got brighter and disappeared and reappeared several times before it vanished. nearly a second or two later, an unexplained searchlight pointed upwards from the ground in the field behind my house (which is fenced in) and reflected off the nearest building for several seconds. no noise was heard by either lights and there were no people from where the search light came from in the field. both events gave us an eerie feeling. also strange was that there was no noise or wind or animal noises and the crickets stopped chirping when this was happening.
content.summary: Orange orb in sky and weird light in field afterwards

content.detailedDescription: Went for a walk with my dog after the superbowl ended and fireworks died down around my naborhood. at first thought they where fire works as i turned the corner. but they where not falling out of the sky. i saw 3 orange circles the for about 5 mins or so. they where perfectly spaced apart. the top one was to the right of the other two alittle. bottom two where directly up and down. as i stopped to watched they stayed in formation for about two to three more mins then the top one moved to the right totaly on its own slowly,stopped for about a min. then faded out all of a sudden. then after that happen the other two stayed in place for a short time period of time. then started to rottate to the right. staying in a line of each other and kind of a rottating axes pivet point circle kind of pattern evenly spaced apart the whole time. they did a 180 slowly and stayed for about a min or two longer then faded out all of a sudden at the exact same time. living next to the airport i new they where not a plane at all. i had tryed to take pics of the orange glowing balls in the sky to see if i could get a closer better view when i got to the end of the block and was watching them. but they where to far away and i was to shaky so i could not get any.
content.summary: 3 orange glowing circles evenly spaced apart then fade out.

content.detailedDescription: Went for a walk with my dog after the superbowl ended and fireworks died down around my naborhood. at first thought they where fire works as i turned the corner. but they where not falling out of the sky. i saw 3 orange circles the for about 5 mins or so. they where perfectly spaced apart. the top one was to the right of the other two alittle. bottom two where directly up and down. as i stopped to watched they stayed in formation for about two to three more mins then the top one moved to the right totaly on its own slowly,stopped for about a min. then faded out all of a sudden. then after that happen the other two stayed in place for a short time period of time. then started to rottate to the right. staying in a line of each other and kind of a rottating axes pivet point circle kind of pattern evenly spaced apart the whole time. they did a 180 slowly and stayed for about a min or two longer then faded out all of a sudden at the exact same time. living next to the airport i new they where not a plane at all. i had tryed to take pics of the orange glowing balls in the sky to see if i could get a closer better view when i got to the end of the block and was watching them. but they where to far away and i was to shaky so i could not get any.
content.summary: 3 orange glowing circles evenly spaced apart then fade out.

content.detailedDescription:
At 3:12, i stepped out for a cigarette. it's hazy tonight along the horizon here. almost straight up in the atmosphere, i saw a yellowish star-like object ascending at a rapid speed. i thought it might be a plane at first, but there was no sound. and it did not strobe.

i live between midway and o'hare, and i'm familiar with the way commercial aircraft look and sound at varying altitudes. this object had no strobes, and made no sound. it was not a case of take-off lights dimming to strobes. this object was going straight up and moving away from my line of vision. 

when i first saw it, it looked like a very bright star and became a very small, unwavering speck in six seconds or less. i caught it out of the corner of my eye, from the south, goinging slightly north. it was well above the haze on the horizon. i was looking straight up from my balcony when i saw it. absolutely no sound, and i have never seen nothing move out of sight that quickly, so clearly.
content.summary: Star-like object ascending rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
I have become even more interested in the ufo phenomena following my ufo sighting and video capture on april 16, 2014 in las vegas, nevada. i reported my previous ufo sighting to mufon along with the video, my testimony and the message another witness gave me along with a map and a photo another witness took. that case (55525 or 55529 ��� got two numbers from mufon) was proven to be an unknown or a uav after it was investigated by mufon. 

i have been spending extra time each night monitoring the skies over the las vegas valley since that incident. my home is in summerlin and my backyard has a wide open view of the las vegas valley and much of north las vegas as well. at around 10:47 pm on 7/17/2014 i began filming some flashing lights that were blinking brightly over the mountains in the north part of the valley. i had no idea what they were but i had seen them several times before but had never been able to shoot video of them. i also thought they were airplanes the first time i saw them because they were flying in a line or spaced formation. each time i have seen them they have always been north of my home and far enough away where i couldn���t tell exactly what they were or hear any noise. they always appeared to be in the north on every occasion and near the mountains. 

on 7/17/2014 i saw them again but this time they were just remaining stationary. they seemed to be slowly drifting to the north. i filmed them for more than five minutes when i finally decided i couldn���t see them through the view finder any longer and stopped the video. the camera was the camera that comes with my galaxy s4 telephone. it was set on night mode and already zoomed in all the way before i ever shot video because the blinking lights seemed to be so far away. there didn���t seem to be anything fantastic about them until i went inside my home and previewed the video. the lights were baffling. i then came back outside about twenty five minutes later to see if they were still there. to my surprise they were although very faint. i used a good set of binoculars and sure enough they were still in the exact same area but farther away. to shoot the video i propped my arms up on our block wall and kept the camera still the whole time and never needed to change the direction i was pointing the camera. i was tempted to change the direction once or twice because the screen on the phone looked dark but i didn���t because i remembered the lessons i learned from my first video capture.

i also made a map of where i believe the objects were located and finally i used photoshop to blowup consecutive screen captures i did of the objects. i believe i took about fifteen different screen captures and blew them up side by side so that they would be accurately displayed after being blow up. it appeared to me that there were a minimum of four objects and possibly five. i waited to file this report because i now run a facebook group that relates to ufo���s in the usa. many in the group felt they were not airplanes or anything else that could be explained and could be ufo���s. it���s because of the group members that i decided this was worth pursuing and investigating. i have no idea what they were but i���d be very interested to find out.
content.summary: Bright blinking lights hovering and drifting slowly north over tallest mountain in the north end of the las vegas valley

content.detailedDescription: I was floating in my pool when i noticed an object in the sky. it looked round in shape and seemed to be hovering. i pointed the object out to my wife. we watched for several minutes and the object never seemed to move. i got out of the pool, dried off and went into the house to get my phone. i recorded the object 2 separate times. i could not see the object while i was recording so i went into the house after recording to see if the object was visible in the camera. the 3rd time i recorded the object is the recording i will upload with my report. in the video you can see the object hovering just about center screen and to the left of the tree. at the 56 second mark you can see the 2nd object come down from the top of the screen at a high rate of speed and meet the 1st hovering object. unfortunately i was so shocked by what i had witnessed i moved the camera right after this happened. when i looked back both objects were gone. there was no sound from either object.
content.summary: Observed one object hovering for several minutes. another similar object descended from the north at a high rate of speed and met the hovering object.

content.detailedDescription: I have a small recording studio is a small building on family property.  i was recording a client's music.  we took a break and went outside around 2:00 am.  i'm in the country and surrounded by almond orchards so it's pretty dark without the city lights.  i had sprinkled but not rained hard and there were clouds obscuring the sky and keeping the stars hidden.  we both noticed a bright light in the sky that was in view above the orchard trees, but seemed to be far from us (in the direction of fresno).  we thought it was the moon, but it was far too bright and we could see two smaller bright lights in the middle of the glow that could be seen even though partially obscured by clouds.  the light actually could be seen through the clouds.  we watched it for approximately 3 minutes.  i remembered i had a camera inside the studio and i quickly went inside to grab and hopefully take a picture.  just as i got it in hand, my client said that the two lights in the middle just disappeared. the place in the sky was still glowing brightly, but dimming quickly.  i tried to get my camera to focus on the area, but it was too dark.  the light dissipated after about 5 minutes it was completely dark.  the entire event was approximately 10 minutes from the time we spotted the unknown light until it was over.  i'm clueless to what it may have been, but it was very much out of the ordinary.  i've never seen anything similar in the time i have lived here.
content.summary: Bright object in eastern sky. two smaller bright lights in the center. hovered and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the window ledge of our two story house, i was eleven years old. i was watching a jet plane fly over the coast mountains from east to west. the planes in those days didn't go so fast. suddenly ,in the same direction as the plane was going this cigar shaped orangish object came zooming across the sky. it was quite a ways under the plane. it was gone in seconds but i could see its direction was straight. the object appeared about quarter the size of the plane. the plane continued on in the same direction. i should mention we lived on the beach and i was looking over the water (inlet) to the mountains. i realized even then as a child i'd seen something very unusual and i have never forgotten it. we lived in a remote area with only float planes and i was used to seeing them. i know this sighting isn't the same type people see today, but given the year ,aviation was not that far advanced. also i just wanted to let you know that even then odd things spotted.  when i saw the object i was a little frightened and also awed. i lost sight of the object as it flew into the west ,it was a sunny day and it went so fast.
content.summary: Long orange object zipping under plane

content.detailedDescription: On friday, july 4, 2014 it was a clear night. the time was about 22:30. my wife and i observed four glowing orange orbs slowly moving across the sky from north to south. each one appeared one at a time. they moved rather casually, perhaps a few hundred feet in the air. the first one as it was nearly over head seemed to have a glowing mushroom/ parachute / balloon look to it similar to what you would see in a balloon, but these made no sound. there was no normal on then off again firing of the flame as you would expect a balloonist to do as when they try to regain altitude. the third one also had the same appearance.  the second and forth objects did not seem to have the balloon look to them. they were just orange balls glowing in the sky. as each object traveled to the south it disappeared over the tree line. there were possibly 2 or 3 minutes between each passing, so we only saw one at a time.  each one seemed to come from the same general area and they took very similar straight line flight path as if the others were following the first one.  none of them seemed to change altitude, and were all at about the same altitude. these were not any form of fireworks that i have ever experienced, and i do not believe that these were any kind of fireworks. i know the date of occurrence make this sound questionable, but this is what we observed.  this occurred over the south west edge of xenia, ohio over gerdes field.
content.summary: 4 orange glowing orbs or fireballs in sky over xenia, ohio

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture of the sunset in sarnia ont. these "fairies" appeared. totally undoctored. took a pic before and after never replicated.  i watched a show on tv where muffin was involved. "idols over earth". it was about fairies in trees. thought this may interest you.
content.summary: Fairy looking object flying near tree

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room, it was early on in the night, around 10pm. i was getting ready for bed when i looked out my window and saw three spherical objects in the distance. i just so happened to look to my right hand side when i saw the objects in the distance. at first, i was not sure what they were, but then i noticed that they made an isosceles triangle shape. they just hovered there! suddenly, a fourth object came from what would be the bottom or smaller side of triangle. the fourth object came into the middle part of the triangle. it came in an out about three times from the center of the triangle. the other three objects that made the triangle did not move, they just stayed in one place. at first, i thought it was a constellations in the distance, but then i started to see the fourth object come in an out. i was surprised, startled, and somewhat nervous. i only lost sight of the objects when i decided to stop looking and went to bed. i probably saw them for about ten minutes.
content.summary: Three shapers in a triangle formation. it looked like an isosceles triangle. a fourth object came from the smaller side of the triangle. they just hovered.

content.detailedDescription: Not a sound amber in color and did drop something glowing same color. saw other air planes in the sky not the same. we live by an air port this was not a small plane of any sort.
content.summary: Small plane from dupage airport went over it no sound bright amber in color pulsed and droped something sort of hue light made an s shaped u turn to chicago

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday july 12 2014 myself and two friends were camping at geneva state park campground. while sitting around enjoying our campfire, i noticed an orange light moving in from the east above the treeline. the object made no noise, and the only reason i noticed it was chance. i was first struck by the silence of it - completely abnormal for any flying object i know of. it's straight and steady course was also curious. the object was in view for about 30-45 seconds at the end of which it's flight became erratic before it disappeared behind the horizon or treeline to the west. myself and my friends thought it was extremely strange but dismissed it as a one-off strange light. 

however, approximately 20-30 minutes later, another object appeared following the same exact path east to west. it did not exhibit the same erratic behavior at the end of it's flight as the first object. by myself and my one friend, who is former us military, both walked out from our campsite to the campsite ring road to better see the object. we were most struck by it's complete silence and constant, non-wavering light. at this point we began to speculate as to what they may have been. a rocket or missile of some kind crossed my mind but there was no exhaust and absolutely no noise. a parachute flare being blown by the wind also crossed my mind but friend confirmed that it wouldn't be a constant light. the other thought i had was it resembled tracer fire from a heavy machine gun but it was too consistent in intensity and i seriously doubt we would see tracers being fired over an ohio state park. we watched the object as it proceeded to the west before disappearing behind the treeline or horizon. we returned to our campsite and wondered what the mysterious objects were. 

an additional 20-30 minutes later, we were astonished to see 2 objects flying in a line formation from south to north with a 2-3 second gap between them. i say 2-3 seconds because we were unable to determine with any accuracy the height or size of the objects. they were below the cloud cover however as the weather was partly cloudy. these 2 objects also proceeded at a steady and silent pace until they too disappeared from sight. all of the objects disappeared out of sight in the approximate direction of lake erie. 

the objects themselves were all the same, glowing orange spheres that silently moved through the air. aside from the first one which exhibited erratic movement they all followed a straight line path. also, during the entire period of the sighting of the objects we were able to hear a booming in the distance to south. i cannot speculate as to what it was but it was a deeper sound than fireworks. artillery fire is the closest we could figure it to be but we can't say conclusively. 

after seeing the pair of objects we hoped to see additional ones to get on camera or video. however for the duration of our stay (until the 17th) we did not see any additional objects. i can provide a detailed sketch if that would be of assistance. 

personally i have had an interest in aircraft my entire life and have seen more than a few strange things in the sky but have been able to explain them all. however, i can think of no object that could exhibit the characteristics of what we saw that night. my friend also confirmed that is his military experience he had never seen anything that behaved as these objects did. 

feel free to contact me for additional details.
content.summary: 4 orange spheres observed at night over geneva, ohio

content.detailedDescription: I awoke looking out the widow of camper. i saw the sunrise with  some clouds and just above the trees there was an object diamoned shape with the reflectjon of the rising sun  shimmering off one side and on the shadow side the was what appeared to be a radar dish or as if it was opening.  it was about 100 feet away and about 30 feet above the trees. ther was also powerlines nearby.  no  sound at all. i grabed my iphone an took some pictures the videod it. i felt as if i didn't believe my eyes, and a little purplexed. and excited all at once. i didn't go outside because people were sleeping and the screen door makes a screeching noise when you open it and it was very early and we finished settling in late last night.
content.summary: Awoke & looked out at the sunrise and saw object i took photos and video. diamon obj. with a radar dish like obj. atttached

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work and the sky was bright nd clear.I saw 6 lights in a line and one light looked as if itb was cheking over the other ones.The direction was ne.No noise at all,and definately in earth orbit.
content.summary: In orbit and one light looking as if checking out other craft

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen a ufo goes very fast over the sky at night.
there were two airplanes, near, for can compare it.

vi un ovni que iba muy deprisa apareciendo desde montserrat hasta santpedor, con mucha rapidez.
pude comparar esa luz (que parec��a una estrella) con 2 aviones que estaban en la misma l��nea horizonte.
content.summary: Ufo fly fast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Just gazing at the night sky which is my hobby. observed a star like object. initially i thought it must be a plane or something but after gazing at it carefully n contantly i experienced it was not a star nor a plane but something else which hv never seen as usual. could not take any snap as i was nt carrying ny gadget that time
content.summary: A star like moving in a straight path slowly

content.detailedDescription:
It was a partial cloudy night in july 2014, around 9 p.M.
i was taking photos of beautiful clouds passing by.
never saw anything unusual nor did i hear anything.

a couple of days later, i downloaded them.
as i'm viewing them. i noticed in the first photo# dscf 3255. there was this little bright spot/circle with two gray smoky trails coming down from each side of it.
i thought, well that's weird and continued on viewing the rest of them.
didn't see anything else weird.

curious about the first photo. i decided to enlarge it for a better view the only thing that made sense for me was, that maybe it's a jet. 
traveling from west to north east. but, then i remembered i didn't hear any jets that night.


so i decided to enlarge the rest of them to see if i could see something else.

in the photo # dscf 3257, i found a black dot in the sky a little ways farther to the right from where i first noticed this object. and above the area of the pointy rocky hill.

in the photo # dscf 3259. again a little farther to the right of the last position of the object. there's a white spot/circle with a black ring around it.

in the photo # dscf 3265. again a little farther to the right of the last position of the object. there's a white spot/circle with a black ring around it near a tree.

in the photo # dscf 3266. again a little farther to the right of the last position of the object. the object is now among the leaves. and it's the last photo with the object.
content.summary: Did not see anything at the time. only saw it when reviewing photos.

content.detailedDescription:
It was night time and my mother, brother, boyfriend, and i were in the car going home from church. my mother noticed it first and excitedly began pointing and yelling "look a ufo! a ufo!"

my brother and boyfriend both saw it before i could (i was at an odd angle in the car where the roof was getting in my way), but i could see bright white lights following directly to the left of our vehicle just behind the treetops (both sides of the road were lined with trees).

i finally glimpsed the object, and had enough time to note that it looked like a hovering, dark pyramid before it shot off into the direction of the city. we watched it move away from us in the sky for several minutes (it took about 2 seconds for it to get so far away that it just looked like a bright light in the distance) before it was gone completely.

this sighting further peaked my interest in ufos and what they meant to my life. years of denial over my first sighting were slowly being torn down. (see case number 58,200)

**note: as in my last report, i was asked to post this by alabama state director richard hoffman when i talked to him and his wife at the mufon symposium.**
content.summary: Pyramid-like object followed over/behind tree tops

content.detailedDescription:
One night when i was eight years old, my mother wanted to stop by a friend's house on the way home. i do not remember details about where the friend lived or even which friend it was, nor do i think that my mother would even remember if i asked. it was a very rural, wooded neighborhood not far from phenix city or crawford. 

she went inside for a very short time, leaving my older brother (in the front seat) and myself (back seat, right side, next to the window) in the car.

as we were waiting, i looked out of the window to the sky and saw a lead grey, slightly reflective disk hovering about 30-40 feet over and to the right of our car. it made absolutely no sound and made no action that would have given it away. if i hadn't looked out, i would not have noticed it at all.

the disk hovered, rotating slightly, while i watched it for about a 60 seconds. then, it shot off into the sky and out of sight, making a slight sound. the sound itself is hard to explain, a bit like the swishing displacement of air and a bit like a humming/pulsing sound.

the sight of the saucer terrified me, and i never asked my older brother if he saw it, too. so deeply routed was my fear that i kept it to myself for all of my adolescent life and refused to believe in the reality of the ufo phenomenon. however, my denial couldn't make me forget. but it was not until my second sighting 9 years later that i began to seriously start researching the subject and come to terms with my experience.

**note: i discussed this with alabama state director richard hoffman at the 2014 mufon symposium. he asked that i report this case, despite it having happened so long ago.**
content.summary: Saucer hovered next to car

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:15 pm, i was driving west on 78th street.  it was dusk, and i looked at the sky, because it was an unusual deep dark blue, color, not too often seen. sitting in the sky were two dull gold colored lights, with red centers,  they were pulsating.  they were not amber or yellow in color, they were actually a dull gold color, something i have never seen.  they were not as high as the airplanes fly. they were low, but much higher than treetop level. i realized they were ufos because they were pulsating, and because of the dull gold color.  there was no place to pull off the road, find my cell phone, and get a picture.  when i did pull off the road into a parking lot, got my phone, and looked up to where they were, i was upset to see that they had vanished.  i immediately got the idea to take a pic of where they had been in the sky. sadly, i took more pictures of the beautiful night sky, in different directions, and went home. this is the picture of the area in the sky where i had seen them.  i had put my cell phone out the window, and snapped a shot of where they had been.
content.summary: Two pulsating lights sitting in sky.  dull gold color (not amber or yellow), actually gold color, with red in the center
